meta.author: Subir Chowdhuri
meta.description: Make VSCode typecheck your entire project, not just the currently open file.

frontmatter.summary: When editing a TypeScript project VSCode typechecks only the currently opened file. Here is a recipe to run TS check on your entire project and show errors in VSCode's 'Problems' pane
frontmatter.title: VSCode & TypeScript: Report Errors From the Entire Project
